title: Pat Cash
summary: Patrick Hart Cash (born 27 May 1965) is an Australian former professional tennis player. He reached a career-high ATP singles ranking of world No. 4 in May 1988 and a career-high ATP doubles ranking of world No. 6 in August 1988. After winning the men's singles championship at Wimbledon in 1987, Cash climbed into the stands to celebrate, starting a tradition which has continued ever since by many winners.
